subject: Marketing
title: Consent and Dark Patterns
description: One-minute skill: Consent and Dark Patterns.

hook.text: Cookie consent popups make 'Accept All' big and green. 'Reject' is tiny and gray.

buildup.text: Dark patterns are interface designs that manipulate users into choices they didn't intend.

discovery.text: Real consent requires clear options, easy refusal, and no punishment for saying no.

twist.text: Many 'consent' flows are designed specifically to prevent meaningful choice.

climax.text: The EU's GDPR requires informed consentâ€”but enforcement hasn't caught most dark patterns yet.

punchline.text: Designed confusion isn't consent. It's coercion.

quiz.question: What are dark patterns in digital marketing?
options: Interface designs that manipulate users into unintended choices
Website themes that use dark color schemes
Marketing campaigns run during nighttime hours
